entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Haines Junction
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
